text: Killing a Traitor () is an Iranian movie Drama, written and directed by Masoud Kimiai. This movie depicts the life of Mehdi Baligh, the most famous Iranian thief and swindler. Also Killing a Traitor was make in February 2021 in the cinema town of Tehran. ==References== * Category:2022 movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Persian-language movies Category:Movies directed by Masoud Kimiai
title: Killing a Traitor
